name: PAT_CUR_TRT_EPSD
description: The current treatment plan episodes for a patient.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds to each treatment plan episode (HSB) for the patient in this row.

columns.name: CUR_TRT_PLAN_TYP_ID_EPISODE_DEF_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the name of the episode / block definition record.

columns.name: CUR_TRT_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The episode (HSB) record ID of a treatment plan episode for the patient in this row.
